likelihood_impact_change.explanation: Under the Net Zero 2050 scenario, consumer preferences may shift towards more sustainable and eco-friendly products. While this could reduce the likelihood of negative market shifts for Apple, it could also increase the impact if the company fails to meet these new consumer expectations.

emerging_opportunities.description: Development of eco-friendly iPhone models that utilize recycled materials and comply with sustainability standards.
Innovations in software that enhance the energy efficiency of iPhones could attract environmentally conscious consumers.

additional_challenges.description: The transition to sustainable materials may require significant changes in the supply chain, potentially leading to disruptions and increased costs.
Increased competition from other tech firms launching sustainable products could pressure Apple's market share.

mitigation_strategies.description: Focus on sourcing sustainable materials for iPhone production, reducing reliance on non-renewable resources.
Launch campaigns to educate consumers about the sustainability of iPhone products to enhance brand loyalty and preference.
Partner with suppliers who meet high sustainability standards to strengthen the supply chain and reduce environmental impact.
